kitronik_lab_bit: Blocks for driving the Kitronik LAB bit Board
kitronik_lab_bit.HueInterpolationDirecti: ZIP LED Hue Interpolation direction options
kitronik_lab_bit.MotorDirection: Different directions for motors to turn
kitronik_lab_bit.ZIPString.clear: Turn off all LEDs on the ZIP LED string.
kitronik_lab_bit.ZIPString.rotate|param|: number of ZIP LEDs to rotate forward, eg: 1
kitronik_lab_bit.ZIPString.setBrightness: Set the brightness of the ZIP LEDs. Applies to future changes.
Set the brightness of the ZIP LEDs. Applies to future changes.
a measure of LED brightness in 0-255.
a measure of LED brightness in 0-255.
kitronik_lab_bit.ZIPString.setPin: Set the pin where the ZIP LED is connected, defaults to P0.
kitronik_lab_bit.ZIPString.setZipLedColo:
Set particular ZIP LED to a given color. 
You need to call ``show changes`` to make the changes visible.
RGB color of the ZIP LED
position of the ZIP LED in the string
kitronik_lab_bit.ZIPString.show: Send all the changes to the ZIP LEDs.
kitronik_lab_bit.ZIPString.showBarGraph:
Displays a vertical bar graph based on the `value` and `high` value.
If `high` is 0, the chart gets adjusted automatically.
kitronik_lab_bit.ZIPString.showColor: Shows all ZIP LEDs display as a given color.
kitronik_lab_bit.ZIPString.showRainbow: Shows a rainbow pattern on all ZIP LEDs.
kitronik_lab_bit.ZipLedMode: Different modes for RGB or RGB+W ZIP strips
kitronik_lab_bit.colors: Gets the RGB value of a known color
kitronik_lab_bit.colors|param|color: is the list of ZIP LED colours in the drop down box
kitronik_lab_bit.createZIPString: Create a new ZIP LED driver for a number of attached ZIP LEDs.
kitronik_lab_bit.createZIPString|param|n: the number of ZIP LEDs connected to the LAB bit board, eg: 7
kitronik_lab_bit.diceLED: Individually control each LED on the dice arrangement
kitronik_lab_bit.diceLED|param|dicePower: is the choice of whether the LED selected is turned on or off
kitronik_lab_bit.diceOff: Will turn off all the dice LED's
kitronik_lab_bit.diceShow: Illuminates the LED on the dice to show the dice
kitronik_lab_bit.diceShow|param|diceRoll: number that shows the dice number on the LED's eg 1
kitronik_lab_bit.listenForClap: Performs an action when a loud noise is detected, such as a clap
kitronik_lab_bit.listenForClap|param|cla: is the number of claps to listen out for before running the function eg: 1
kitronik_lab_bit.listenForClap|param|sou: is function that is run once detection in sound
kitronik_lab_bit.listenForClap|param|tim: is period of time in which to listen for the claps or spikes eg: 1
kitronik_lab_bit.measureCm: Measure the echo time (after trigger) and converts to cm, then return value as an int
kitronik_lab_bit.measureIn: Measure the echo time (after trigger) and converts to inches, then return value as an int
kitronik_lab_bit.motorOn: Turns on motor in the direction specified at the requested speed
kitronik_lab_bit.motorOn|param|speed: how fast to spin the motor
kitronik_lab_bit.readAnalogInput: Read the scaled value of the analog input, value returned is between 0-100
kitronik_lab_bit.readAverageSoundLevel: Read Sound Level blocks returns back a number 0-512 of the current sound level averaged over 5 samples
kitronik_lab_bit.readRawAnalogInput: Read the raw value of the analog input, will return a value between 0 and 1023
kitronik_lab_bit.readScaledAverageSoundL: Read Average Sound Level blocks returns back a number 0-100 to represent the average sound level from 5 measurements
kitronik_lab_bit.readScaledSoundLevel: Read Sound Level blocks returns back a number 0-100 of the current sound level at the point the block is used
kitronik_lab_bit.readSoundLevel: Read raw Sound Level blocks returns back a number 0-512 of the current sound level at that point
kitronik_lab_bit.rgb: Converts red, green, blue channels into a RGB color
kitronik_lab_bit.rgb|param|blue: value of the blue channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
kitronik_lab_bit.rgb|param|green: value of the green channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
kitronik_lab_bit.rgb|param|red: value of the red channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
kitronik_lab_bit.setClapSensitivity: Set how sensitive the microphone is when detecting claps
kitronik_lab_bit.showDiceNumber: Illuminates the LED on the dice to show the dice
kitronik_lab_bit.showDiceNumber|param|di: charector number that shows the dice number on the LED's eg 1
kitronik_lab_bit.trafficLightOff: Will turn off all the LED's on the selected traffic light
kitronik_lab_bit.trafficLightShow: Traffic light block using the colour picker selection to determine which light is turned on or off
kitronik_lab_bit.trafficLightShow|param|: color picket to if the light is turned on or off, eg: #00ff00
color picket to if the light is turned on or off, eg: #ff0000
is the choice of which traffic light is selected and controlled.
color picket to if the light is turned on or off, eg: #ffff00
kitronik_lab_bit.trafficLightStatus: Block sets the traffic light to aparticular status using words
kitronik_lab_bit.trafficLightStatus|para: is the selection of which traffic light will be controlled
